targets.query: SELECT LAST("instrumented")/LAST("loaded") FROM instrumentation_state WHERE $timeFilter AND service =~ /^$service/
SELECT 1 - LAST("queuesize")/LAST("loaded") FROM instrumentation_state WHERE $timeFilter AND service =~ /^$service/
SELECT SUM("counter") FROM "inspectit_self_logs" WHERE ("service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "level" =~ /^ERROR$/ ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT SUM("counter") FROM "inspectit_self_logs" WHERE ("service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "level" =~ /^WARN$/ ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT SUM("counter") FROM "inspectit_self_logs" WHERE ("service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "level" =~ /^INFO|DEBUG|TRACE$/ ) AND $timeFilter
